original_text: So he gave a command to all his soldiers. He told them to go with him from Harosheth Haggoyim to the Kishon river. They had 900 iron chariots.
korean_text: 시스라가 모든 병거 곧 철 병거 구백 대와 자기와 함께 있는 모든 백성을 하로셋학고임에서부터 기손 강으로 모은지라

sentences.original_text: So he gave a command to all his soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 그의 모든 병사들에게 명령을 내렸다

sentences.original_text: He told them to go with him
from Harosheth Haggoyim to the Kishon river
